title: erigon version 2.40.0-stable debug_traceTransaction is not woking for eth chain and  paniced
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `./erigon --version`
erigon version 2.40.0-stable
OS & Version: Windows/Linux/OSX
ubuntu 20.04
Commit hash: 
https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/commit/38fb38a92edccb9ea1505686ed5e361208bf81f1
Erigon Command (with flags/config):
 ./erigon --chain=mainnet --datadir eth_data --http.addr 0.0.0.0 --http.port 8545 --http.vhosts=192.168.0.108 --torrent.download.rate=50m --torrent.upload.rate=100kb --ws --http.api=eth,debug,net,trace,web3,erigon --authrpc.port=8551 --torrent.port=86581 --private.api.addr=0.0.0.0:9091 --port=8658 --prune= --prune.h.older=12000000 --prune.r.older=12000000 --prune.t.older=12000000 --prune.c.older=12000000 --snapshots=true --p2p.protocol=66
Concensus Layer:

Concensus Layer Command (with flags/config):

Chain/Network: 
eth
#### Expected behaviour
erigon version 2.40.0-stable debug_traceTransaction not woking for eth chainï¼Œand triggers panic

#### Actual behaviour
 curl -X POST --data '{
>    "jsonrpc": "2.0",
>    "method": "debug_traceTransaction",
>    "params": ["0xefbd76fa76a70a2736bfe015a4fab42c3ff4fa814d26679dab8625ebbac824da"],
>    "id": "0xefbd76fa76a70a2736bfe015a4fab42c3ff4fa814d26679dab8625ebbac824da"
> }' -H 'content-type:application/json;' http://192.168.1.108:8545
{"jsonrpc":"2.0","id":"0xefbd76fa76a70a2736bfe015a4fab42c3ff4fa814d26679dab8625ebbac824da","result":{"structLogs":[],"gas":21000,"failed":false,"returnValue":""}}

erigon says:
[EROR] [03-07|11:12:51.518] RPC method debug_traceTransaction crashed: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
just run latest verson the trace any tx than has been synced

#### Backtrace
here is the panic info

````
[backtrace]
````


this error is not  happen on older version before 3.40
This issue is stale because it has been open for 40 days with no activity. Remove stale label or comment, or this will be closed in 7 days.
